properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.help: The type of the OS that is included in the disk if creating a VM from user-image or a specialized VHD.

properties.help: The description of the gallery image definition.

properties.name: DisallowedDiskTypes
properties.help: Disk types which would not work with the image, e.g., Standard_LRS.

properties.name: EndOfLifeDate
properties.help: The end of life date, e.g. '2020-12-31'.

properties.name: Eula
properties.help: The Eula agreement for the gallery image.

properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: GalleryImageDefinition
properties.help: Gallery image definition.

properties.name: GalleryImageVersion
properties.help: Gallery image version in semantic version pattern. The allowed characters are digit and period. Digits must be within the range of a 32-bit integer, e.g. <MajorVersion>.<MinorVersion>.<Patch>.

properties.name: GalleryName
properties.help: Gallery name.

properties.name: ManagedImage
properties.help: Image name(if in the same resource group) or resource id.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: EndOfLifeDate
properties.help: The end of life date, e.g. '2020-12-31'.

properties.name: ExcludeFromLatest
properties.help: The flag means that if it is set to true, people deploying VMs with version omitted will not use this version.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: ReplicaCount
properties.help: Default replicate count. For region specific, use --target-regions.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: TargetRegions
properties.help: Space separated region list, use "<region>=<replicate count>" to apply region specific replicate count.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: GalleryImageDefinition

properties.name: GalleryImageVersion
properties.help: The name of the gallery Image Version to be created. Needs to follow semantic version name pattern: The allowed characters are digit and period. Digits must be within the range of a 32-bit integer. Format: <MajorVersion>.<MinorVersion>.<Patch>.

properties.help: Gallery name.

properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: TargetRegions
properties.help: Space separated region list, use "<region>=<replicate count>" to apply region specific replicate count.

properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: GalleryName
properties.help: Gallery name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Expand
properties.help: The expand expression to apply on the operation.

properties.name: Created
properties.help: Wait until created with 'provisioningState' at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Custom
properties.help: Wait until the condition satisfies a custom JMESPath query. E.g. provisioningState!='InProgress', instanceView.statuses[?code=='PowerState/running'].

properties.name: Deleted
properties.help: Wait until deleted.

properties.name: Exists
properties.help: Wait until the resource exists.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: Polling interval in seconds.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Maximum wait in seconds.

properties.name: Updated
properties.help: Wait until updated with provisioningState at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
